resources.string: You\'ve reached the final level of this world! Enjoy 10 extra lives as a reward.
No ads are available at the moment. Please try again later.
This option only applies to users in the US and Europe. Your privacy is already automatically protected in your region.

string-array.name: phrase_finish_win
string-array.item: Awesome! You finished the game and showed your skill.
Congratulations! Every effort paid off.
You did it! Your perseverance got you here.
Great job! This achievement is all yours.
Impressive! You successfully completed the game.
Brilliant! Every step brought you closer to victory.
Well done! You overcame all challenges.
You did it! Your consistency and dedication paid off.
Victory! Enjoy this achievement—you earned it.
Congrats! You finished the game with flying colors.

string-array.name: phrase_game_over
string-array.item: Don\'t give up, you\'re on the right track!
Every attempt brings you closer to success.
Great achievements start with small steps.
Keep going! You\'ll get it next time.
Losing is also part of learning.
You can\'t win without trying again.
Take a deep breath and try again.
Even the best failed before succeeding.
It\'s not the end, it\'s a new opportunity.
You improve with each game!
Cats always land on their feet—you can too!
Excellent effort! Keep it up.
A stumble is not a fall.
Try again, you can beat it!
Learning is trying again.
Every defeat leaves a lesson.
You\'re closer than you think!
Don\'t give up now, next time is yours.
Practice makes perfect.
One more try and you\'ll get it!
Your progress is more important than victory.
Your effort shows, keep going!
Falling is fine, getting up is key.
Don\'t forget to have fun, even when you fail!
Today wasn\'t it, but tomorrow could be.
True players never quit.
You have what it takes, don\'t stop!
Losing just means you\'re learning.
Every attempt adds experience!
Even cats need more than one life to win!

string-array.name: phrase_start_game
string-array.item: Today is a great day to achieve something new!
Give your best, the rest will come naturally.
Take a deep breath… and play!
Every game is a new opportunity.
The adventure begins, make it count!
Believe in yourself, you can do it!
Today you can beat your own record.
Don\'t wait for the perfect moment, create it!
The best move is the one you\'re about to make.
Get ready to surprise yourself!
Today is another chance to shine.
Practice makes the impossible possible.
Nothing can stop you when you try seriously!
Start strong, finish proud.
This is your moment, enjoy it!
A new challenge awaits, let\'s go!
Great players start by taking a step.
Fun is about to begin!
Do it with passion, not just to win.
Today you can show what you\'re made of!
Playing is also a way to grow.
Dare to improve with each try!
Every great achievement begins with a first attempt.
Focus and enjoy the challenge!
Today might be the day you break your record.
Trust yourself, play, and have fun!
Effort always leaves its mark.
Enjoy the game, the rest will follow!
Today you can achieve more than you think.
Start strong and finish with a smile!

resources.string: Let’s see if you can beat yourself in the next game! Soon you’ll enjoy new levels.
